attributes.action: Child Abuse Law to recognise  to pre 1979 not just post 1979
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to Campaign to change the current Law on those Child Abuse Victims not being compensated for criminal injuries to themselves if the said and proven abuse took place before 1979, the LAW should recognise all child abuse victims are entitled to criminal injury compensation not just those abused after 1979
